metadata.name: Anomaly and Arrangement
metadata.description: This artwork captures a deep and intimate connection between the image of flowers and the concept of digital glitches. Its interpretation is virtually boundless, with the message standing resolute and unshaken over time. The content has been rearranged to create a sequence that seamlessly blends the organic beauty of pedals with the modern aesthetics of pixels. The resulting artwork is a harmonious interplay between traditional and digital elements that invites viewers to explore the relationship between nature and technology.
